instructions:
Spread It: Spread Hellmann's (R) or Best Foods (R) Canola Real Mayonnaise on tortillas.
Stuff It: Layer chicken, red pepper, red onion and salad greens down center of each tortilla.
Wrap It: Roll and fold the filled tortillas.
title: Chicken 'n Veggie Wraps
ingredients: 1/4 cup Hellmann’s® or Best Foods® Canola Cholesterol Free Mayonnaise
4 (6 inch) fajita size whole wheat flour tortillas
12 ounces boneless skinless chicken breasts, grilled and sliced
